intro.subTitle: About Me
intro.text: Engineer in the industry, globetrotter & passionate about digital sciences. I like to bring a modern vision to my projects.

experience1.intro: Dalkia Air Solutions designs, supplies and installs compressed air production, treatment and distribution solutions
experience1.description: In a design office, I am in charge of realizing the automation part on all our projects, writing the functional analysis, programming, designing the architecture and commissioning on site.

experience2.intro: I took advantage of the periods of confinement and the stop of my activity to orient myself towards data and web technologies, I participated in a bootcamp 'Le Wagon', I studied Python and JavaScript.
experience2.description: Python is a computer language widely used for AI and data analysis, while JavaScript is the language of the web. I made several applications like this WebCv. Here is a partial list of framwork and technology I use: React, Sass, Node, Bsoupe, Flask, FastAPI, Jupyter, TensorFlow .

experience3.intro: LAB is a company that realizes technical solutions for the treatment of smoke and exhaust gases throughout the world.LAB works with big names such as Peter DÖHLE, Hapag-Lloyd or MSC.Within this framework they provide turnkey equipment such as "Scrubber" which will come to clean the exhaust gases on the customers' ships.
experience3.description: On the ships, I was responsible for the commissioning of the installation with a team composed of automaticians, mechanics and electricians ranging from 3 to 5 people, I reported in parallel to the client company (LAB) and to the super steward (official representative of the company operating the ship and using our system).

experience4.intro: Air-liquid develops, installs and sells a new product for the liquid methane industry and transportation. The Turbo-Brayton (TBF) is an equipment capable of sub-cooling LNG in a very efficient way through heat exchangers. The technology is based on the Brayton (reverse) cycle: a refrigerant gas is compressed, cooled and finally expanded in a turbine designed for this purpose. The cold gas is then used to cool the customer's LNG.
experience4.description: On the ships, I was responsible for the commissioning of the Turbo-Brayton with a team composed of 1 to 4 commissioning engineer, I reported in parallel to the client company (ALAT).

experience5.intro: Areva is a French multinational group specialized in nuclear energy and renewable energies.
experience5.description: Preparation, management and coordination of the "LOOP tests" (Loss of Offsite Power) on the Olkiluoto EPR. The LOOP tests are a set of tests aimed at checking the start-up of the emergency diesel generators (EDGs), and then of the standby diesel generators (SBOs), during the loss of the electrical grid (GRID), on the four units of the nuclear power plant. The Olkiluoto nuclear power plant is located on the island of Olkiluoto, 40 km south of Pori, in the Gulf of Bothnia in western Finland.
